ROR Lab 38: Active Record Associations (2)

Tuesday, 4 June 2013

제1교시 : Active Record Associations (2) (시즌3 - 7)

제2교시 : Active Support Core Extensions (5) (DD1 - 5)

2교시는 동영상이 없습니다
